description:
* An adaptation of the final Majin Buu arc.
Seven years have passed since http://anidb.net/ch20915 [Cell]`s defeat, and the Z Fighters have returned to normal life. http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] has continued his training in the Other World, http://anidb.net/ch30875 [Kuririn] has gotten married, and http://anidb.net/ch9915 [Gohan] has his hands full attempting to navigate the pitfalls of high school. But with the new World Martial Arts Tournament about to begin, it`s time for Gokuu and the Z Fighters to reunite and face off against the greatest warriors on Earth!
Meanwhile, the evil wizard http://anidb.net/ch41759 [Babidi] has traveled across the galaxy on a quest for revenge, hoping to fulfill his father`s thwarted dreams of universal domination. The http://anidb.net/ch67299 [Supreme Kai] has come to enlist the aid of the Z Fighters in his effort to prevent Babidi from awakening a monster of unimaginable terror—http://anidb.net/ch41758 [Majin Buu]!
Note: The international version has 8 additional episodes that were not released in Japan, for a 69 total. However, European and American DVD/BD releases also include a Japanese dub of these extra episodes.

titles.title: 7 Years Since Then! From Today On, Gohan`s in High School
